Package org.forgerock.openam.ldap

Class LDAPUtilException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
          • org.forgerock.openam.ldap.LDAPUtilException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    L10NMessage, Serializable
    public class LDAPUtilException
extends ExecutionException
implements L10NMessage
    Exception that is thrown when the user fail the LDAP authentication.
    See Also:
